properties.name: miro.client.id
properties.description: Client ID of the miro Application.

properties.name: miro.client.secret
properties.description: Client Secret of the miro Application.

properties.name: miro.redirectUri
properties.description: Redirect URI sent to Miro for OAuth.

properties.name: miro.baseUrl
properties.description: Base URL of our Datasource: Miro.

properties.name: miro.api.baseUrl
properties.description: Base URL for the Miro API.

properties.name: miro.api.oauthTokenEndpoint
properties.description: OAuth Endpoint of the Miro API, used to post the Auth-Token.

properties.name: miro2cml.authorizeReceiverEndpoint
properties.description: URI-suffix to internal OAuth receiver Endpoint.

properties.name: miro.api.boardCountLimit
properties.description: Maximum amount of Boards, which shall be fetched from miro.

properties.name: miro2cml.stringValidator.maxTextSize
properties.description: Maximum Text size for Widget Texts.
